reviews.title: Was good but....
reviews.comment: Many of the BBC sports related pages don\'t open any more and an error occurs.  Please fix
reviews.author: Ian Hornby

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Anybody not giving this app 5 stars need their h**ds testing. Perfect well done.

reviews.comment: None of the BBC sports articles work, all lead to 404 errors, otherwise nice app....

reviews.comment: Love this app! All my news and sport from various sources in one place. Brilliant!

reviews.comment: Running on Archos 70. One of the best on the market at the moment. Although not a smart as News Republic, it is as easy to use, and is very fast.

reviews.title: Portrait only
reviews.comment: This would be exactly what I am looking for if if could be viewed in landscape mode. As it is, I\'ll be looking for something else.
reviews.author: Tracy McGarey
